content: CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 31 Mar 2019If I have $70,000 in my CPF OA & SA, does shifting $10,000 into CPFIS for investment makes the balance of $60,000 eligible for that additional 1% interest? ?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 31 Mar 2019It's already getting the additional 1% interest right now. Don't have to do anything. First 20k of OA is at 3.5% and first 40k of SA is at 5%.0 comments0
